# 塔罗的藏宝

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/taluode-cangbao
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/taluode-cangbao
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install taluode-cangbao
taluode-cangbao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g taluode-cangbao
taluode-cangbao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
